main event: Multiple witnesses reported seeing unidentified aerial phenomena in Anaheim, California on July 28, 1955.
interesting points: There were 4 witnesses to the event., The sighting lasted for 6 minutes., Witnesses described the object as having the brightness similar to an ordinary star, but illuminated in colors red, green, white, and blue., The objects reportedly moved out of sight to the northwest., The conclusion suggests it may have been an aircraft with an advertising sign.
witness description: Described a bright light changing direction and brightness, appearing larger than a star.
